statements: SELECT * FROM image_annotations;
SELECT id, image_name, annotation_text FROM image_annotations;
SELECT id, image_name, bounding_box_x, bounding_box_y, bounding_box_width, bounding_box_height FROM image_annotations;
SELECT image_name, annotation_text, bounding_box_width FROM image_annotations;
SELECT * FROM image_annotations WHERE bounding_box_height > 50;
SELECT * FROM image_annotations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_name, annotation_text FROM image_annotations WHERE bounding_box_x > 100 AND bounding_box_y < 50;
SELECT id, image_name, bounding_box_width, bounding_box_height FROM image_annotations WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM image_annotations WHERE annotation_text LIKE '%cat%';
SELECT image_name, bounding_box_width, bounding_box_height FROM image_annotations ORDER BY bounding_box_width DESC, bounding_box_height DESC;
SELECT * FROM ImageAnnotations WHERE bounding_box_x > 100;
SELECT image_id, annotation FROM ImageAnnotations WHERE annotation LIKE '%dog%';
SELECT annotation, bounding_box_width, bounding_box_height FROM ImageAnnotations WHERE annotation = 'car';
SELECT * FROM ObjectLocalization WHERE object_id = 10 ORDER BY localization_id DESC;
SELECT localization_data FROM ObjectLocalization WHERE image_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM ImageAnnotations WHERE image_id = 1 LIMIT 10;
SELECT annotation, bounding_box_x, bounding_box_y, bounding_box_width, bounding_box_height FROM ImageAnnotations WHERE bounding_box_x > 100 AND bounding_box_y < 200;
SELECT * FROM ObjectLocalization ORDER BY localization_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT image_id FROM ObjectLocalization WHERE object_id = 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_annotations FROM ImageAnnotations WHERE bounding_box_width > 500 AND bounding_box_height > 500;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM images WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT annotation_text FROM annotations WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM bounding_boxes ORDER BY x1 ASC, y1 DESC;
SELECT * FROM annotations WHERE annotation_text LIKE '%interesting%' ORDER BY annotation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_url LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM images WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT i.image_id, i.image_url, a.annotation_text, b.x1, b.y1, b.x2, b.y2 FROM images i INNER JOIN annotations a ON i.image_id = a.image_id INNER JOIN bounding_boxes b ON a.annotation_id = b.annotation_id WHERE b.x1 < 50 AND b.y1 < 50 ORDER BY i.image_id ASC, b.x1 DESC;

SELECT i.image_id, COUNT(a.annotation_id) AS num_annotations FROM images i LEFT JOIN annotations a ON i.image_id = a.image_id GROUP BY i.image_id HAVING num_annotations > 1 ORDER BY num_annotations DESC;

SELECT i.image_id, AVG(b.x2 - b.x1) AS avg_width FROM images i INNER JOIN annotations a ON i.image_id = a.image_id INNER JOIN bounding_boxes b ON a.annotation_id = b.annotation_id GROUP BY i.image_id HAVING avg_width > 10 ORDER BY avg_width ASC, i.image_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM image_annotations;
SELECT object_name, annotation_text FROM image_annotations WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM bounding_boxes ORDER BY x_min ASC, y_min DESC;
SELECT image_id, category_name FROM image_object_mapping JOIN object_categories ON image_object_mapping.object_id = object_categories.category_id;
SELECT * FROM image_annotations WHERE object_name = 'car' AND annotation_text LIKE '%red%';
SELECT * FROM image_annotations WHERE object_name = 'car';
SELECT image_id, object_name, annotation_text FROM image_annotations WHERE image_id = 'f6b82eed-7bca-4c69-a806-502c7c5b3c75';
SELECT annotation_text, object_name FROM image_annotations WHERE object_name = 'person' AND image_id = '18e8114e-5815-4f2a-b336-2ccf3998662a';
SELECT annotation_text FROM image_annotations ORDER BY image_id DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT * FROM image_annotations INNER JOIN image_object_mapping ON image_annotations.image_id = image_object_mapping.image_id INNER JOIN object_categories ON image_object_mapping.object_id = object_categories.category_id WHERE object_name = 'car';
SELECT * FROM image_annotations LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_id, annotation FROM image_annotations WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT annotation FROM image_annotations WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM bounding_boxes ORDER BY x_min ASC, y_min DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT bounding_box_id, x_min, y_min, x_max, y_max FROM bounding_boxes WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT * FROM image_annotations;
SELECT annotation, image_id FROM image_annotations WHERE annotation LIKE '%car%';
SELECT bbox.bounding_box_id, bbox.x_min, bbox.y_min, anno.annotation FROM bounding_boxes AS bbox JOIN image_annotations AS anno ON bbox.image_id = anno.image_id;
SELECT DISTINCT class_name FROM object_classes;

SELECT anno.annotation, class.class_name FROM image_annotations AS anno INNER JOIN annotation_classes AS anno_class ON anno.image_id = anno_class.annotation_id INNER JOIN object_classes AS class ON anno_class.class_id = class.class_id ORDER BY anno.annotation ASC;
